attributes.action: prevent the alteration of the provisions in the Freedom of Information (Parliament) Order 2009 which would remove the expenses of Members of Parliament and Peers from the scope of the Freedom of Information Act.  The order will single out MPs and Peers in a special category as the only paid public officials who will not have to disclose full details of their expenses, causing a regressive effect on Parliamentary transparency, a detrimental impact on Parliament in the eyes of the public; and is an attack on MPs' and Peers' accountability to members of the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Title is overlong. Also similar petitions already exist.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
